/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_86,code=[compute_86,sm_86] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/app/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/core/cloth/cloth_builder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/render/vulkan/vk_renderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/ui/ui_panel.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/third_party/imgui/imgui.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/third_party/imgui/imgui_draw.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/third_party/imgui/imgui_widgets.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/third_party/imgui/imgui_tables.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/third_party/imgui/imgui_impl_glfw.cpp.o CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/third_party/imgui/imgui_impl_vulkan.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/clothsim.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  libcuda_solver.a  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
